channel.title: My food glitch plz help
channel.description: well ive got a glitch were when i attack a npc i cant eat it wont let me eat it like wont let me eat for erm id say like 5-10 seconds after attack npc? i have to run back and try to eat for it to work could eny1 help me on this i only need it for sharks thats the food i use plz plz help

item.title: My food glitch plz help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] case 315: //Shrimps
if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
healing[1] = 3;
healing[2] = 3;
healing[3] = -1;
healTimer = 4;
sendMessage(“You eat the shrimps.”);
}
break;

case 379: //Lobster
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 12;
		healing[2] = 12;
		healing[3] = -1;
		healing[4] = 379;
		healTimer = 4;
		sendMessage("You eat the lobster.");
	}
	break;

case 385: //Shark
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 20;
		healing[2] = 20;
		healing[3] = -1;
		healing[4] = 385;
		healTimer = 4;
		sendMessage("You eat the shark.");
	}
	break;

case 7946: //Monkfish
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 16;
		healing[2] = 16;
		healing[3] = -1;
		healing[4] = 7946;
		healTimer = 4;
		sendMessage("You eat the monkfish.");
	}
	break;

case 6685: //Sara brew (4)
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 16;
		healing[2] = 16;
		healing[3] = 6687;
		sendMessage("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		healTimer = 4;
	}
	break;

case 6687: //Sara brew (3)
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 16;
		healing[2] = 16;
		healing[3] = 6689;
		sendMessage("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		healTimer = 4;
	}
	break;

case 6689: //Sara brew (2)
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 16;
		healing[2] = 16;
		healing[3] = 6691;
		sendMessage("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		healTimer = 4;
	}
	break;

case 6691: //Sara brew (1)
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 16;
		healing[2] = 16;
		healing[3] = 229;
		sendMessage("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		healTimer = 4;
	}
	break;

case 391: //Manta ray
	if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) {
		healing[1] = 24;
		healing[2] = 24;
		healing[3] = -1;
		healTimer = 4;
		sendMessage("You eat the manta ray.");
	}
	break;[/code]

[code] public boolean healing() {
if (healTimer == 3 && healing[0] == 1) {
int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int Heal = healing[1];
int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);

		setAnimation(829);
		deleteItem(healing[4], getItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);
		Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);
		if (healing[3] != -1) {
			addItem(healing[3], 1);
		}
		NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		}
		if (healing[2] == 20 || healing[2] == 24 || healing[2] == 16 && healing[3] == -1 || healing[2] == 12 || healing[2] == 3) {
			sendMessage("It heals some health.");
		}
		if (healing[3] == 6687) {
			sendMessage("You have 3 doses of potion left.");
		}
		if (healing[3] == 6689) {
			sendMessage("You have 2 doses of potion left.");
		}
		if (healing[3] == 6691) {
			sendMessage("You have 1 dose of potion left.");
		}
		if (healing[3] == 229) {
			sendMessage("You have finished the potion.");
		}
            	PkingDelay = 7;
		IsDead = false;
		IsDeadTimer = false;
                    updateRequired = true;
    		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		resetHE();
	}
	return true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
